name: SpaceCrew
description:
Dear Sir/Madam,

 You have been chosen in our lottery to defend our Mother planet - Earth. It is very honorable position, so we do not expect that You turn us down. In this critical situation we need everyone to work together!

  • You are the one who will be destroying dangerous objects coming to Earth.
  • You are the one who will be the HERO.
  • You are the one who will safe us!

We want you to join our Space Crew. Come to our office in Little Italy on 17th January 2024. We have opened from 9 am to 5 pm.

Sincerely,

   Rhubaruth from Earth Crew

Used Assets:
  • Pixel Planet Generator
  • Kenney Tower Defense
  • Kenney Digital Audio
  • Sever Sans Font
